snippet: Questions about a memorial beam beneath 1 World Trade Center and strange markings on the nearby streets.
abstract: FYI column answers questions regarding the whereabouts of the white column that World Trade Center survivors signed and meaning of the letters 'ECS' that have been spray-painted at street level throughout area near the World Trade Center site, marking locations of city's underground telecommunications conduits.
lead_paragraph: Questions about a memorial beam beneath 1 World Trade Center and strange markings on the nearby streets.

headline.seo: Answers to Questions About New York
